text: Barbara Reich Freiberg is a former teacher and a politician. She has been a member of the Louisiana House of Representatives for the 70th district since 2020. In 2010, Freiberg was elected to the East Baton Rouge Parish School Board for District 7 and was elected again in 2014. On December 10, 2016, she was elected to the Metro Council in Baton Rouge, representing District 12. She served there until she was elected to the Louisiana House of Representatives in 2019. == References == Category:American educators Category:Living people Category:Louisiana Tech University alumni Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Republican Party members of the Louisiana House of Representatives Category:21st-century members of the Louisiana State Legislature Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Barbara Freiberg
